summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Background Scanner / Live Scanner feature. All 9 backend API tests passed. Frontend LiveAlertsPanel component renders correctly with SSE connection, scanner status, and control buttons. Scanner auto-starts on server startup and runs every 60 seconds scanning 15 symbols for 4 setup types (rubber_band, breakout, vwap_bounce, squeeze).
passed_tests: GET /api/live-scanner/alerts - Returns 200 with alerts array and scanner_running status
GET /api/live-scanner/watchlist - Returns 15 default symbols (NVDA, TSLA, AMD, etc.)
Frontend: LiveAlertsPanel renders with 'Live Trade Alerts' header
Frontend: 'Live' badge displayed indicating active scanner
Frontend: Scan info shows '2 scans | 0 alerts'
Frontend: 'No active alerts' message displayed (expected - market conditions don't match)
Frontend: 'The scanner is analyzing the market...' message shown
Frontend: Control buttons (pause, bell, expand) present
critical_code_review_comments: BackgroundScannerService properly implements async scan loop with rate limiting
SSE endpoint correctly streams connected event and heartbeats
LiveAlertsPanel connects to SSE stream and displays real-time status
No alerts generated because market conditions don't match setup criteria (rubber_band, breakout, vwap_bounce, squeeze) - this is expected behavior
context_for_next_testing_agent: Background Scanner / Live Scanner feature fully tested. Key endpoints: GET /api/live-scanner/status, GET /api/live-scanner/alerts, POST /api/live-scanner/start, POST /api/live-scanner/stop, GET /api/live-scanner/stream (SSE). Scanner auto-starts on server startup, scans 15 symbols every 60 seconds for 4 setup types. Frontend LiveAlertsPanel displays real-time status via SSE connection. No alerts are currently generated because market conditions don't match the setup criteria (rubber_band requires price >2.5% below EMA9 with RSI<38, breakout requires price within 1% of resistance with RVOL>=2, etc.).

background_scanner_service.note: No alerts because market conditions don't match setup criteria

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/live-scanner/status: Working - returns running state, scan_count, watchlist_size
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/live-scanner/alerts: Working - returns alerts array (empty) and scanner_running
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/live-scanner/stream: Working - SSE endpoint returns connected event

frontend_features.scan_status: Working - shows scan count and alerts count
